!4 1. Check if plus icon & input field is visible
|script          |browser test                                                     |
|Go to the Test Suite Demo                                                         |
|hover over      |xpath=(//a[@href= 'TestSuiteDemo.FrontEndTests.T001GoogleTest']) |
|wait for visible|xpath=(//i[@class= 'fas fa-plus-circle addTag'])                 |
|click           |xpath=(//i[@class= 'fas fa-plus-circle addTag'])                 |
|wait for visible|xpath=(//input[@class= 'tagInputOverview ui-autocomplete-input'])|

!4 2. Add new tag
|script          |browser test                                                                                               |
|Go to the Test Suite Demo                                                                                                   |
|hover over      |xpath=(//a[@href= 'TestSuiteDemo.FrontEndTests.T001GoogleTest'])                                           |
|wait for visible|xpath=(//i[@class= 'fas fa-plus-circle addTag'])                                                           |
|click           |xpath=(//i[@class= 'fas fa-plus-circle addTag'])                                                           |
|wait for visible|xpath=(//input[@class= 'tagInputOverview ui-autocomplete-input'])                                          |
|enter           |frontendtag|as                           |xpath=(//input[@class= 'tagInputOverview ui-autocomplete-input'])|
|press Enter                                                                                                                 |
|wait seconds    |1                                                                                                          |
|check           |value of   |xpath=(//span[@class= 'tag'])|frontendtag                                                      |

!4 4. Handling with special characters
